post.body: CCoBB was good. Amazing what they did with special effects. Quite fascinating! Glad to know Doubt was good: tomorrow.
enjoy the show!
welcome to my humble following of twitterers Mr. Hebert. I hope you are doing well.
I am happy to not have to be taking final exams. ;) such a good feeling.
Looking forwrd to a spectacular 2009! G'night frm Central Standard Time. Heading to buy a few new suits for '09 in the a.m.
Happy 2009 'New Year'!
Grilling burgers and getting rdy fr the LSU game!
Wish I were in NYC for NYE again... Sad. LOL. Anyone doing anything in Baton Rouge?
Just saw "bedtime stories". I found it amusing: I laughed. Hah
Wow. Terrible wreck outside the neighborhood. http://twitpic.com/y38d
"Curious Case of Benjamin Button" in 9 minutes at Perkins Rowe. Should be good. Can't wait to see Doubt! That also looks great!
Wow. "Bully" for Wii is a fun game. A productivity killer for sure. Goodnight.
Just finished watching the one man show "Lyman Bourke" in downtown BR.
Um...Late Merry Christmas twitter friends. I took a vacation (including twitter).
Love love love Christmas time. :D 5 days left.
Bored for the first time in I cannot remember how long.
In Baton Rouge to see Pete Sampras play James Blake at LSU.
Heading to dinner to watch the Heisman Trophy Show.
A beautiful day without snow. Yesterday was just enough snow for me! Happy I don't have to continue having it for the winter!
Photos of Snow in Baton Rouge - http://idek.net/vs
